workExperience.description: Utilized Python and SQL for customer segmentation analysis using K-Means and PCA. Automating weekly reporting and developing Tableau dashboards to support marketing strategies.
Analyzed business data for retail clients to optimize operations. Designed data-driven solutions and provided actionable insights for client projects.
Contributed to the product lifecycle management for a mobile app, including gathering user feedback, defining requirements, and coordinating development and launch activities.

projectExperience.description: Led a team in analyzing customer behavior and sales trends, identifying key sales drivers, and proposing optimization strategies for an e-commerce platform.
Developed a personal finance app integrating real-time stock data APIs and budgeting tools, focusing on enhancing UI/UX for improved user engagement.

education.description: Coursework covered Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, SQL for Data Science, and Software Engineering Principles.
